description.en:
What is the project about?
LBVV is a utility coin that aims to build a significant layer 2 and layer 3 crypto technology. Few examples metaverse world, NFT Marketplace, Avatar and Game Fi

What makes your project unique?
LBVV had a goal and mission that were quite clear. The ecosystem of LBVV, where one coin may be used on various decentralized products, is its most distinctive feature. 

History of your project.
LBVV started at May 18th 2023 with a 1 Million USDT in liquidity. During it's launch LBVV had already released it's first product which is NFT collection and NFT Marketplace.


What’s next for your project?
The NFT Marketplace was LBVV's first product had been released.Game Fi and Metaverse World, Dex and it's own Cex will follow soon after. LBVV intended to broaden their exposure at the same time by listing their coin on multiple cex.

What can your token be used for?
LBVV can be use to their product such as Game Fi, NFT Marketplace, Metaverse world , dex and cex
description.de:
What is the project about?
LBVV is a utility coin that aims to build a significant layer 2 and layer 3 crypto technology. Few examples metaverse world, NFT Marketplace, Avatar and Game Fi

What makes your project unique?
LBVV had a goal and mission that were quite clear. The ecosystem of LBVV, where one coin may be used on various decentralized products, is its most distinctive feature. 

History of your project.
LBVV started at May 18th 2023 with a 1 Million USDT in liquidity. During it's launch LBVV had already released it's first product which is NFT collection and NFT Marketplace.


What’s next for your project?
The NFT Marketplace was LBVV's first product had been released.Game Fi and Metaverse World, Dex and it's own Cex will follow soon after. LBVV intended to broaden their exposure at the same time by listing their coin on multiple cex.

What can your token be used for?
LBVV can be use to their product such as Game Fi, NFT Marketplace, Metaverse world , dex and cex

The NFT Marketplace was LBVV's first product had been released.Game Fi and Metaverse World, Dex and it's own Cex will follow soon after. LBVV intended to broaden their exposure at the same time by listing their coin on multiple cex.

What can your token be used for?
LBVV can be use to their product such as Game Fi, NFT Marketplace, Metaverse world , dex and cex
description.hi:
What is the project about?
LBVV is a utility coin that aims to build a significant layer 2 and layer 3 crypto technology. Few examples metaverse world, NFT Marketplace, Avatar and Game Fi

What makes your project unique?
LBVV had a goal and mission that were quite clear. The ecosystem of LBVV, where one coin may be used on various decentralized products, is its most distinctive feature. 

History of your project.
LBVV started at May 18th 2023 with a 1 Million USDT in liquidity. During it's launch LBVV had already released it's first product which is NFT collection and NFT Marketplace.

LBVV can be use to their product such as Game Fi, NFT Marketplace, Metaverse world , dex and cex
